channel.title: HL walktroughs (HD and with subtitles)
channel.description:
Hey. Sof you may remember me before the database crash, where I lost my whole interesting in the BMS forums.
Anyway, I'm here to show off the project I'm working. GordonCam. I play HL games and related stuff and post them on youtube, just like 50 other assholes, except that I dont record it with fraps and upload directly.
That's right, my videos are fucking HD[/SIZE] and have CLOSED CAPTIONS AND SUBTITLES IN 50 LANGUAGES. And I play each level 20 times before editing, making it close to perfect, unlike other youtubers that die 500 times in their videos And I made a channel just to post them Basically, I'm copying [url='https://www.youtube.com/user/gtamissions']GTA missions[/url]
So here's my channel: [url='https://www.youtube.com/user/GordonCam'][b]GordonCam[/b][/url] And my current videos so far:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e3B2H6LQYz8']Hazard Course 1/2[/url] - No subtitles [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyQPHNhFapw']Hazard Course 2/2[/url] - No subtitles [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyQPHNhFapw']Black Mesa Inbound 1/1[/url] - Subtitles [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YE2J85YJ1aM']Anomalous materials 1/1[/url] - Subtitles [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HZJuafM0zhk']Unforseen Consequences 1/1[/url] - Subtitles
Thanks raw_bean, for the excellent help with the subtitles. Congrats for the promotion though.
The last video dates from 15th March. You must be thinking: LOL DEAD L0000ZER, but no. The problem is that for reasons I'm not telling this my only PC right now:
[img]https://img4.imageshack.us/img4/1373/dscf0500c.jpg[/img]
This is a laptop I got for 150 euros 3 years ago (Its linked to the monitor 'cause the screen broke). I can run episode 2 in minimum, but making HD videos with piece of shit would be plenty stupid. So yeah, no more new videos until I get a new PC, or someone gives me one. (pleeeeeeeease)
BTW I'm looking for a designer that would make me a channel design and a nice logo
Enjoy! or whatever else

item.title: HL walktroughs (HD and with subtitles)
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
HotChiliPepper:

Yeeeesssss, but no. A “let’s play” video is a video where some fat guy plays for the first time something and records it. I add notes, make it acessible for 50 languages and I show step by step how it’s supposed to play Half Life, So I can help people stuck some part of the game.

BTW I’ve never seen this video before. Thhis guy ripped off my intro.

So it’s a more viewable let’s play!

Just kidding. Sounds good but, I think people would prefer the text docs because finding what to do next in a doc is easier than searching through 20 videos.

Read full topic

item.title: HL walktroughs (HD and with subtitles)
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
A walkthrough is a document which attempts to teach a player how to beat or solve a particular game.

Yours is more like a “Let’s Play! Half-Life”

Read full topic

item.title: HL walktroughs (HD and with subtitles)
item.dc:creator: HotChiliPepper
item.description:
Hey.
Sof you may remember me before the database crash, where I lost my whole interesting in the BMS forums.

Anyway, I’m here to show off the project I’m working. GordonCam. I play HL games and related stuff and post them on youtube, just like 50 other assholes, except that I dont record it with fraps and upload directly.

That’s right, my videos are fucking HD[/SIZE] and have CLOSED CAPTIONS AND SUBTITLES IN 50 LANGUAGES.
And I play each level 20 times before editing, making it close to perfect, unlike other youtubers that die 500 times in their videos
And I made a channel just to post them
Basically, I’m copying GTA missions

So here’s my channel: GordonCam
And my current videos so far:

Hazard Course 1/2 - No subtitles
Hazard Course 2/2 - No subtitles
Black Mesa Inbound 1/1 - Subtitles
Anomalous materials 1/1 - Subtitles
Unforseen Consequences 1/1 - Subtitles

Thanks raw_bean, for the excellent help with the subtitles. Congrats for the promotion though.

The last video dates from 15th March. You must be thinking: LOL DEAD L0000ZER, but no. The problem is that for reasons I’m not telling this my only PC right now:

This is a laptop I got for 150 euros 3 years ago (Its linked to the monitor 'cause the screen broke). I can run episode 2 in minimum, but making HD videos with piece of shit would be plenty stupid. So yeah, no more new videos until I get a new PC, or someone gives me one. (pleeeeeeeease)

BTW I’m looking for a designer that would make me a channel design and a nice logo

Enjoy! or whatever else

Read full topic
